    • Method Detail

      • resolveUri

        public Uri resolveUri(Uri uri)
        Description copied from class: Resolver
        Resolves a string uri into a correct uri. Use this method to convert from a custom uri scheme into a standard one such as `cache://` to `file://` or `assets://`
        Specified by:
        resolveUri in class Resolver
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri to resolve
        Returns:
        The resolved uri or null

      • resolveFile

        public byte[] resolveFile(Uri uri)
        Description copied from class: Resolver
        Resolves a file from the given uri. This will load the file synchronously.
        Specified by:
        resolveFile in class Resolver
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri to resolve
        Returns:
        The raw byte data of the loaded file, or null
